.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a default token serializer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializer.CertificateValidationMode%2A><xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializer.RevocationMode%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializer.TrustedStoreLocation%2A> properties are initialized to the following values: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.DefaultCertificateValidationMode?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.DefaultRevocationMode?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.DefaultTrustedStoreLocation?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: public MetadataSerializer (System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer tokenSerializer);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer tokenSerializer) cil managed

Docs.param: The token serializer that will be used to serialize security tokens.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that uses the specified token serializer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializer.CertificateValidationMode%2A><xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializer.RevocationMode%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializer.TrustedStoreLocation%2A> properties are initialized to the following values: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.DefaultCertificateValidationMode?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.DefaultRevocationMode?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.DefaultTrustedStoreLocation?displayProperty=fullName>.

protected virtual System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 GetMetadataSigningCertificate (System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier ski);

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 GetMetadataSigningCertificate(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier ski) cil managed

Docs.param: The key identifier from which to create the X.509 certificate.
Docs.summary: Gets the X.509 certificate created from the specified key identifier.
Docs.returns: The X.509 certificate that was created from the specified key identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks By default, this method only supports key identifier clauses of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause>. You can override this method to support other kinds of key identifier clauses. This method is invoked by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializer.ValidateSigningCredential%2A> method.

Docs.exception: Cannot find a key identifier clause of type in . Enforces the default behavior, you can override this method to support other key identifier clauses.
